meanings.definition: An organism consisting of one or more cells with a distinct nucleus and membrane-bound organelles.
meanings.sent1: Eukaryotes are living things with a central control center in their cells.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study eukaryotes to understand how cells function in complex organisms.
meanings.sent3: The eukaryotes had a meeting in the nucleus to discuss cell division.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cells, eukaryotes are like the CEOs with their own offices.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, eukaryotes look like tiny cities bustling with activity.

meanings.definition: A member of the domain Eukaryota, which includes plants, animals, fungi, and protists.
meanings.sent1: Eukaryotes such as plants and animals have complex structures and functions.
meanings.sent2: The diversity of eukaryotes in nature is truly fascinating.
meanings.sent3: At the eukaryote party, the plants and animals danced together.
meanings.sent4: In the kingdom of life, eukaryotes reign supreme with their diversity.
meanings.sent5: The world of eukaryotes is like a colorful garden filled with different species.
